description: The children to render. Usually a list of ListboxItem or ListboxSection
Item objects in the collection. (dynamic)

type: solid | bordered | light | flat | faded | shadow
description: The listbox items appearance style.

type: default | primary | secondary | success | warning | danger
description: The listbox items color theme.
The type of selection that is allowed in the collection.
The currently selected keys in the collection (controlled).
The item keys that are disabled. These items cannot be selected, focused, or otherwise interacted with.
The initial selected keys in the collection (uncontrolled).
Whether the collection allows empty selection.
Whether the focused item should be highlighted. It applies the same styles to the items as when hovered.
Where the focus should be set.
The content to display above the listbox items.
The content to display below the listbox items.
The content to display when the collection is empty.
Whether keyboard navigation is circular.
Whether to enable virtualization.
Configuration for virtualization, optimizing rendering for large datasets. Required if isVirtualized is set to true.
Whether to not display the empty content when the collection is empty.
Whether to hide the check icon when the items are selected.
Whether to disable the animation of the listbox items.
Allows to set custom class names for the listbox slots.
Allows to set custom class names for the listbox item slots.
